name: claude-code-bridge-server
description: MCP Bridge Server enabling Gemini CLI to consult with Claude Code for brainstorming and collaboration

scripts.make-executable: esbuild dist/index.js --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --outfile=dist/claude-bridge && sed -i '1i#!/usr/bin/env node' dist/claude-bridge && chmod +x dist/claude-bridge
